articles.title: EastEnders' Charlie Brooks' return to the soap is CONFIRMED! - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, who departed the soap in 2014, is set for a roller-coaster comeback, with bosses hinting she'll take centre stage in the soap's 'biggest storyline of the year.'
articles.content:
EastEnders bosses have confirmed that Charlie Brooks will be returning to the soap to reprise her role as Janine Butcher.
